name: Account Score
description: A feature which enables account scoring based on custom contact level attributes.

name: Account Transfer Tool
description: A feature which enables the transfer of an account from one user to another when responsibilities change.

name: Activity Log
description: A feature which allows you to view the list of actions performed by users.

name: Address Management
description: A feature which allows you to add or edit addresses within the application.

name: Approval Process Control
description: A feature which provides visibility about an item's status.

name: Billable Hours Tracking
description: A feature to track billable hours.

name: Candidate Management
description: Allow for the management of a candidate's profile and resume.

name: Clash Management
description: Allows users to detect and manage clashing schedules efficiently.

name: Customized Order Status
description: Create custom status labels for customer orders.

name: Customizable Subscriptions
description: A feature which allows you to customize a user's subscription model.

name: Daily Limit
description: A feature to specify the maximum number of hours per day that you would like a team member to work on a given project or task.

name: Dashboard Guests
description: A feature to invite people outside of your workspace to view real-time project information via an external dashboard.

name: Expense Tracking
description: A feature which allows you to customize a user's subscription model.

name: Kanban Board
description: A list of lists to track a project and tasks.

name: Live Chat Summary
description: A feature which provides you a bird's eye view of your live chat channel.

name: Leave Tracker
description: A feature to help you track and manage all request leave from a central location.

name: Proposal Generation
description: A feature for automating your proposal generation process and making it entirely customizable.

name: Remote Administration
description: A feature which allows you to manage systems and team remotely.

name: Request Management
description: A feature to help the teams manage incoming requests and queries.

name: Roles and Permissions
description: A feature which allows you to manage systems and team remotely.

name: Settings
description: Basic account settings.

name: Scheduling
description: Ability to prioritise your tasks and schedule them as per your future plan.

name: Service Specific Settings
description: A feature to enable tailored service settings for different users.

name: Task Allocator
description: A feature to let  users quickly allocate tasks to their team members.

name: Task Blocker
description: A feature which makes dependent tasks highly visible in order to drive whatever collaboration is necessary to get them resolved.

name: Task List
description: Create, manage, and track a to-do list of tasks.

name: Task Groups
description: Organise project tasks in groups such milestones and progress stages.

name: Team Builder
description: Timesheet management and prediction that looks at resource availability and makes billing suggestions.

name: Timesheet Management
description: Timesheet management and prediction that looks at resource availability and makes billing suggestions.
